name: Retro Racers!
description:
Race with Freddy and friends!

Come join the gang in this exciting retro racer! Inspired by the Freddy and Friends: On Tour! teasers, in this game you can drive as any of the glamrock animatronics (as well as some new ones!) and compete online or off for retro glory. What are you waiting for? Come on and start rockin' the raceways!

Features:
  • 12 different characters!
  • 3 unique tracks!
  • Singleplayer (vs. AI) and online multiplayer!
  • Retro look and feel!
Controls:

Use your mouse to navigate the menus. Default car controls are WASD and spacebar (for handbrake). R to put your car back on the track (in case you get stuck).

Have fun!

Feel free to post LFP (looking for player) comments down below. Please share any videos as well, I'd love to see them!

IMPORTANT NOTE

I'm using the free version of Photon networking which means only 20 people can be playing concurrently (i.e. at the same time) in MULTIPLAYER. If you receive a connection error it is because there are too many people and you need to try again later. If the game gets popular enough I'll buy more CCU :)

Singleplayer will always work!

There are no jumpscares

The car stat bars are a little messed up but the descriptions should give you an idea of what each one's strength is.

The cars have been tuned but have not been tested in multiplayer so let me know about any inbalances.

Model Credits: Retro Racers - A 3D model collection by SirDJCat - Sketchfab
